subject: Horse Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Horses
lead_paragraph: In his 60 years in racing, Mr. Watters proved a versatile figure. He rode steeplechase horses, then trained champions in steeplechase and flat racing.
snippet: In his 60 years in racing, Mr. Watters proved a versatile figure. He rode steeplechase horses, then trained champions in steeplechase and flat racing.
